General.Name: Cobra Venture Corp
General.Description: Cobra Venture Corporation engages in the exploration and development of petroleum and natural gas properties in Canada. The company holds interests in an oil wells located in the Willesden Green and Davey Lake areas in Alberta; and near Gull Lake in Saskatchewan. Cobra Venture Corporation was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in West Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 2489 Bellevue Avenue, West Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7V 1E1

1.Name: Mr. Sead  Hamzagic CPA, CGA, CPA
